mapper.select: /* admin.board.dao.BoardMapper.xml selBoardDetail */ SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_DESC, ATTACH_ID, VIEW_COUNT, BP_DISP_YN, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT, UPD_ID, UPD_DT FROM T_BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: /* admin.board.dao.BoardMapper.xml insBoard */ INSERT INTO T_BOARD ( BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_DESC, VIEW_COUNT, BP_DISP_YN, ATTACH_ID, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_DT, UPD_ID, UPD_DT ) SELECT #{boardType}, IFNULL(MAX(BOARD_ID),0)+1, #{boardTitle}, #{boardDesc}, 0, #{bpDispYn}, #{attachId}, #{useYn}, #{regId}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), #{regId}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') FROM T_BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType}
